Assistant General Manager Job at Phillips Outsourcing Limited




        
    

        
        Phillips Outsourcing Limited - Our client, a Real Estate Firm, is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Assistant General Manager
Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	The General Manager will oversee the day-to-day operations of the real estate firm, ensuring efficient and profitable business operations.
	The successful candidate will be responsible for managing company resources, developing strategic plans, and ensuring the company's financial health.


Key Responsibilities

	Oversee daily operations, including finance, sales, marketing, and human resources.
	Manage and mentor departmental heads and senior staff.
	Ensure compliance with industry regulations and company policies.
	Monitor and report on financial performance.
	Identify opportunities for growth and development.
	Foster a positive and productive work environment.
	Represent the company at industry events and networking opportunities.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in business administration, Management, or related field (Master's preferred).
	Minimum of 10 years of experience
	Proven experience as a General Manager or in a similar senior management role.
	Strong leadership and strategic planning skills.
	Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities.
	Knowledge of the real estate industry is a plus.

Fleet Supervisor Job at ILS Fleet Management Services Limited




        
    

        
        ILS Fleet Mangement is a subsediary of TAK Logistics Limited, a top-tier transportation firm based in Port Harcourt, with business operations within the west, south and northern areas of Nigeria. We offer unparalleled logistics solutions to our clients. Our expertise lies in efficiently transporting cargoes from production sites to storage facilities across Nigeria, ensuring a smooth and reliable delivery process every time.
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Fleet Supervisor 

Job Locations: Ibadan - Oyo and Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time



Responsibilities
Fleet Management:


	Oversee the daily operations of the company's fleet of vehicles.
	Ensure the fleet is utilized efficiently to meet operational needs.
	Develop and implement strategies to optimize fleet performance and reduce costs.


Vehicle Maintenance:


	Schedule and coordinate regular maintenance and repairs for all vehicles.
	Ensure all vehicles are in compliance with safety and regulatory standards.
	Maintain detailed records of vehicle maintenance and repair activities.


Driver Management:


	Recruit, train, and supervise drivers to ensure they adhere to company policies and safety standards.
	Monitor driver performance and address any issues promptly.
	Conduct regular performance evaluations and provide feedback to drivers.


Vehicle Allocations:


	Manage the allocation of vehicles for various tasks and assignments.
	Ensure vehicles are available and ready for use as per the schedule.
	Coordinate with other departments to meet their transport needs.


Safety and Compliance:


	Implement and enforce safety protocols and procedures for drivers and vehicles.
	Ensure compliance with all relevant transportation laws and regulations.
	Conduct regular safety inspections and audits.


Reporting and Documentation:


	Prepare and submit regular reports on fleet performance, maintenance, and driver management.
	Maintain accurate and up-to-date records of all transport-related activities.
	Provide insights and recommendations for improving transport operations.


Qualifications


	HND in Logistics, Transportation Management, or a related field (preferred).
	3 - 5 years of experience in fleet management, vehicle maintenance, and driver management.
	Strong knowledge of transport regulations and safety standards.
	Excellent organizational and time management skills.
	Strong leadership and interpersonal skills.




Salary
N280,000 - N300,000 / month. 



Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their CV to: humanresources@ilsfleetmgt.com using the Job Position as the subject of their emails.

  "description": "Ascentech Services Limited is a full-fledged Human Resource Solution Provider incorporated in 2013 with its Head Office in Lagos, Nigeria. We are committed to forging long-term partnerships with our clients by creating and delivering robust and flexible services that address the changing needs of their business.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Fashion Sales Executive
Job Location:&nbsp;Victoria Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Attend to customers in-store and online, providing product information and style recommendations.
	Upsell, cross-sell, and convert customer interest into actual sales.
	Offer alternatives when preferred styles, colors, or sizes are unavailable.
	Coordinate customer pick-ups, deliveries, and after-sales follow-up.
	Maintain customer records for retention and repeat sales.
	Work with store staff to ensure a smooth and personalized shopping experience.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess relevant qualifications.
	3 - 4 years of experience in fashion retail sales (luxury or contemporary fashion preferred).
	Tech-savvy with good use of digital tools for client communication and follow-up.
	Strong communication and interpersonal skills; friendly, social, and client-focused.
	Ability to convert walk-ins and online inquiries into sales.
	Well-presented with a professional appearance suitable for a fashion/luxury environment.


Salary
N200,000 - N300,000 / Month.

Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;cv@ascentech.com.ng&nbsp;using &quot;Fashion Sales Executive &ndash; Victoria Island&quot; as the subject of the email.",
